title: need help for making multiple bootdisk

forumNotes.author: ankit
forumNotes.content:
Hello I have some live cds in ISO and some Working OS boot ISO images. Windows XP ( 2-different versions) + winpe cd + Hirents Boot Disk + Windows 98 + Windows Vista + Pass Cracking ISO Image For XP + XP USB version all are ISO images and bootable also individually. Now I want to make just 1 Bootable dvd including all versions and live cds which have manu to select wherever i want to go with ...let me know how can i make it .... which softwares are required ...... and give some instructions that may help me .....
thanks

forumNotes.author: was_jaclaz
forumNotes.content:
ankit,  
we do not support on this board ANY warez related topic.  

However, you should first thing check the flyakite multiboot DVD guide:  
[http://www.flyakite.msfn.org/](http://www.flyakite.msfn.org/ "External link")  

and this thread:  
[http://www.msfn.org/...NUX-t94398.html](http://www.msfn.org/board/Super-Disc-Multi-Boot-Project-CD-DVD-ISOLINUX-t94398.html "External link")  

jaclaz

forumNotes.author: Shirin Zaban
forumNotes.content:
hi Ankit  
download EasyBoot and read it's help.  
I think it is exactly what you want.  
If you could not ,write here ,If needed i will put a tutor about multiboot CD or DVD.  
have good days
